World.headline: Truck crash in California: 'Illegal immigrant' Jashanpreet Singh arrested for killing 3

World.headline: Why India still hangs death row convicts when the world has moved on
World.summary: While most democracies have shifted to more humane execution methods or abolished capital punishment, India continues to hang death row convicts under a 19th-century colonial rule. The Supreme Court is now questioning the reasons behind the law's lack of evolution, prompting a national debate on the practice.
key_points: India still executes prisoners by hanging, unlike many democracies.
The practice is based on a 19th-century colonial rule.
The Supreme Court is reviewing why the law has not evolved.
It sparks a debate on the relevance of capital punishment in modern India.

Science.headline: Earth now has two moons, at least until 2083 – and NASA confirms it!
Science.summary: NASA has confirmed that Earth temporarily has a second moon, a celestial object that will remain in our planet's orbit until at least 2083.
